privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.content: This privacy policy describes how we collect, use, and protect the personal information you provide to us when using our website. We are committed to ensuring the security of your data and using your information only for the specified purposes. By using this site, you agree to the terms described in this policy.

loginPage.subtitle: Access your account to manage your projects and stay on top of your tasks.
loginPage.toSignUp: Don't have an account yet? Create one now

register.title: Create account
register.subtitle: Create your account and start managing your projects while keeping everything organized in one place.
register.toSignIn: Already have an account? Sign in

terms.useDeclaration: By continuing, you confirm your agreement with our
terms.privacyDeclaration: and that you have read our

homeTexts.welcomeMsg: Welcome to the future of innovation
homeTexts.introMsg: Help create startups collaboratively and become co-owner of the projects through tokens linked to the intellectual property.
homeTexts.subtitle1: Help design, build and promote/boost the startups of the future:
homeTexts.card1Description: Click Get started and register with your Google account, Facebook or email address.
homeTexts.card3Description: Join any initiative aligned with your interests and skills.
homeTexts.card4Description: Receive an invitation to the collaborative platform to propose ideas, carry complete missions and earn tokens.
homeTexts.benefit1Description: Become an entrepreneur with your specialized  talent
homeTexts.benefit2Description: Work on what you love under your own rules
homeTexts.benefit3Description: Real financial inclusion as a co-owner
homeTexts.benefit4Description: Diversified tokens operate as an investment fund
homeTexts.benefit5Description: Learn by creating real projects, in real environments
homeTexts.aboutDescription: We are the crazy visionaries, the rebels, the innovators, those who don't settle with the world just as it is. Revolutionary thinkers who believe in only one movement for everyone, in a world without borders. We know freedom is not something we are born with, but something we have to fight for. We advocate for a movement that represents the interests and welfare of society. We believe it is time to change the rules of the game, not to learn to play it.
homeTexts.missionDescription: Accelerate innovation while democratizing access to education and work, allowing humanity to operate as a single organization with no imagined boundaries.
homeTexts.section5Title: It is time to change the rules of the game, not learn to play it
homeTexts.section5Description: We believe the only way to really/truly change society is by democratizing access to a practical education that allows anyone, anywhere in the world, to contribute to the creation of projects and technologies that will determine the course of civilization.
